pullrequest.title: Learn Gazebo Visual Plugins for Ocean Reflections

content.raw:
Another Issue is that when the simulation is paused, the water is still moving. I believe @{557058:6c52d6e5-77e0-41a8-8b6e-cb9462f4d5f1} had fixed that problem before. I will consult him about how to integrate this correctly.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/2683185252-image_1.png)
content.html: Another Issue is that when the simulation is paused, the water is still moving. I believe @Brian Bingham had fixed that problem before. I will consult him about how to integrate this correctly.
